text: after three days of very serious bombing
and missile attacks in Libya led by
France Britain in the United States
President Obama wants the American
forces to pull back let me emphasize
that we anticipate this transition to
take place in a matter of days and not a
matter of weeks the question now becomes
who will run this operation the
Americans would like NATO to take over
command and control but the French are
saying no the French say the Arab League
is too sensitive to the idea of a NATO
operation in an Arab country some people
think it's merely a pretext for the
French to retain their own leadership of
the affair for President Sarkozy this
has been a case to show Frances special
role in the world and it's been very
popular with the French but the way he's
done it has put the noses of some of his
allies out of joint some of them
resented having to come to Paris on
Saturday for a big extravaganza at the
alizee in order to get the operation
going what's unclear however of course
is what's the operation has begun how
long will it last and how will it end
